text: Name: Nida Madina Khan, Email: nmkhan096@gmail.com
Links: linkedIn.com/in/nmkhan096, github.com/nmkhan096

Securiti, Karachi, Pakistan	11/2024 – 05/2025
Data Scientist
Fine-tuned LLaMA 3 using PEFT (LoRA) and Unsloth for multi-label classification of 15+ personal data (PD) column types in structured tables, achieving a macro-F1 of 92% across PD types.
Enhanced model robustness through prompt engineering techniques, data augmentation, analysis tools (t-SNE), and leveraging AI code assistants like Claude Code to streamline dataset preparation.
Built a CNN-based model to detect header rows in CSV files using sentence-transformer embeddings and cosine similarity patterns, improving accuracy by 6% over the previous ML system.
Integrated PyTorch models into a Java-based production pipeline for latency and performance testing, collaborating closely with engineering teams to ensure seamless deployment.

Afiniti Software Solutions Ltd., Remote	02/2020 – 10/2024
Data Scientist II, Artificial Intelligence Team	05/2022 – 10/2024
Data Scientist, Artificial Intelligence Team	05/2021 – 05/2022
Junior Data Scientist, Artificial Intelligence Team	02/2020 – 05/2021

Optimized call routing using machine learning models like Decision Trees to improve customer retention and lifetime value, generating over $1 million in revenue per month, validated through live A/B testing.

Streamlined the ML pipeline in R using a Bash-based orchestration script, optimizing grid search time from several days to <24 hours, and implementing standardized model logging for reproducibility and performance tracking.
Conducted extensive grid search experiments comprising of 1000+ models to find optimal hyper parameters.
Designed interactive dashboards using R and Python, resulting in streamlined tracking and visualization of KPIs.
Conducted real-time production monitoring using MySQL, leading to improved data quality for decision-making.
Used gradient-boosted decision trees (e.g., LightGBM) for predictive revenue forecasting and customer churn models.
Trained 10+ members across three clients on the ML pipeline, R programming and client business, contributing to an increase in project efficiency.

Ask My Resume: an AI-powered resume Q&A web app using RAG and vector search allowing users to query resumes and receive grounded, contextual answers. Achieved 81% retrieval accuracy and 74% accuracy rated by GPT-4o-mini.

End-to-end PySpark data pipeline: a spark workflow to process large-scale taxi trip data (~40M records). Used Spark local mode for prototyping and deployed the final pipeline on a single-node Dataproc cluster on GCP. Ingested Parquet-formatted data from GCS, standardized schemas, and wrote aggregated metrics to BigQuery for reporting and analysis.
Programming: Python, R, SQL, Java, Bash
Data Science & ML: Pandas, Scikit-learn, PyTorch, dplyr, data.table, Data Visualization (ggplot2, Tableau, Looker Studio), Model Evaluation (Cross-Validation, A/B Testing, F1 score)
Probability & Statistics: Hypothesis Testing, Bayesian Inference, Time Series Analysis
Data Engineering & MLOps: Spark, Docker, MLflow, Git, Cloud Platforms (GCP), Grafana, Jupyter
Languages: English (C2), Urdu (mother tongue)

Education
National University of Sciences and Technology, Islamabad, Pakistan	2015 – 2019
B.E. Electrical Engineering
Courses: Machine Learning, Probability & Statistics, Data Structures & Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming
